Class Post

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.shiftac.upartier.data.Post
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacketGenerator, ByteArrayIO

    public class Post
extends java.lang.Object
implements ByteArrayIO, PacketGenerator
    Information about post. when transferring as bytes using ByteArrayIO: 
     class Post
 {
     int id;
     int blockID;
     long time;
     int userCount;
     BString name;
     BString label;
     BString place;
     BString note;
 }

        public int getLength​()
        Description copied from interface: ByteArrayIO
        Note: this method should only be called after the object is properly initialized, but once initialized, this method should return the number of bytes it will consume when write() is called(or number of bytes it comsumed when read() was called previously).

      • fetchPostUserProfile

        public void fetchPostUserProfile​()
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 java.net.SocketTimeoutException,
                                 NoSuchUserException,
                                 NoSuchPostException
        Attempts to fetch profile of user who issued current post.

        Current thread will block inside this call.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if network exceptions occured.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if can't hear from server for Client.NETWORK_TIMEOUT milliseconds.
        NoSuchUserException - if no such user exists.
        NoSuchPostException - if no such user exists.

      • fetchUserList

        public void fetchUserList​(int count)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          java.net.SocketTimeoutException,
                          NoSuchPostException
        Try to fetch user list for current post.

        Current thread will block inside this call.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if network exceptions occured.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if can't hear from server for Client.NETWORK_TIMEOUT milliseconds.
        NoSuchPostException - if no such post exists.

      • fetchMessage

        public void fetchMessage​(User user,
                         int count)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.net.SocketTimeoutException,
                         NoSuchPostException,
                         PermissionException
        Try to fetch count messages for current post, the messages will be stored in messages in reverse order.

        Current thread will block inside this call.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if network exceptions occured.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if can't hear from server for Client.NETWORK_TIMEOUT milliseconds.
        NoSuchPostException - if no such post exists.
        PermissionException - if user is not current user or user hasn't join the post.
